head.title: Equity and Debt Offerings for This Week

hedline.hl1: Equity and Debt Offerings for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Autonomy Corp., Cambridge, England, 6.95 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Autonomy Corp., Cambridge, England, 6.95 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Carreker Corp., Dallas, four million shares. Robertson Stephens.
China Mobile Ltd., Hong Kong, 184.7 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co., Merrill Lynch $ Co. and China International.
Cima Labs, Eden Prairie, Minn., 2.5 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
Community Health Systems Inc., Brentwood, Tenn., 18 million shares, with 14.4 million shares to be sold in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co. and Morgan Stanley, Dean Witter & Co.
Corning Inc., Corning, N.Y., 30 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Corvas International, San Diego, five million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
Energy Partners, New Orleans, an initial public offering of 5.75 shares, with 4.6 million to be sold in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co. and UBS Warburg, joint leads.
Evergreen Solar Inc., Waltham, Mass., an initial public offering of three million shares. BancAmerica Securities.
Express Scripts Inc., Maryland Heights, Mo., six million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Metavante Corp., Brown Deer, Wis., an initial public offering of 16.5 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Optical Communication Products Inc., Chatsworth, Calif., an initial public offering of 10.5 million shares. UBS Warburg.
OSI Pharmaceuticals Inc., Uniondale, N.Y., 4.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens and Lehman Brothers.
TriNet Group, San Leandro, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.9 million shares. Robert W. Baird & Co.
